title: Fix custom prices for sports stickers

requirements.text: Fix the custom sticker pricing functionality specifically for sports stickers to ensure custom prices can be set, saved, and displayed correctly

quotes: stickers is good but for sports i cant make custom prices

acceptanceCriteria: Custom prices can be set for sports stickers in the custom sticker creation form
Custom prices are saved correctly to the backend for sports stickers
Custom prices display correctly in the stickers gallery for sports items
Custom prices appear correctly in the cart for sports stickers
Price conversion between rupees (frontend display) and paise (backend storage) works correctly for sports stickers

requirements.text: Verify that the CustomStickerForm correctly converts custom prices from rupees to paise for all product categories including sports items
acceptanceCriteria: Price input in CustomStickerForm accepts decimal values for rupees
Price conversion multiplies by 100 to convert rupees to paise before backend submission
Conversion logic works consistently for both table tennis and badminton categories

requirements.text: Ensure the backend CustomSticker type and createCustomSticker function properly handle and store custom prices for sports categories
acceptanceCriteria: Custom sticker records store price values in paise (Nat)
createCustomSticker function accepts and persists custom price values
Price data is retrievable via getCustomStickers query for all categories

requirements.text: Verify CustomStickerCard correctly converts stored prices from paise to rupees for display across all sports categories
acceptanceCriteria: Prices display with proper decimal formatting (divided by 100)
Price display is consistent for both table tennis and badminton stickers

constraints: Do not change the existing price storage format (paise as Nat in backend)
Maintain backward compatibility with existing custom stickers
Preserve the existing authentication and authorization flow
nonGoals: Changing the overall pricing model for regular products
Adding new product categories beyond table tennis and badminton
